title: Sarah Ash - Alchymist's Legacy Books 1-2
description:
Tracing the Shadow (Alchymist's Legacy #1)



Sarah AshÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s acclaimed trilogy, the Tears of Artamon, was a stunning blend of sorcery and intrigue, politics and breathtaking imagery. Now this gifted storyteller returns with a tale of a siege between kingdoms, and a battle between heretics and believersÃ¢â‚¬â€each with their own truths, their own lies, and their own soul-shattering discoveries waiting to be made.

Flight into Darkness (Alchymist's Legacy #2)



As an impulsive young man, Rieuk Mordiern accidentally freed Azilis, a guardian spirit charged with keeping the balance between the kingdoms of the living and the dead. Now RieukÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s sole purpose is to bring Azilis backÃ¢â‚¬â€only she doesnÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t want to return. Instead she has attached herself to a very talented mortal, the renowned singer CelestineÃ¢â‚¬â€becoming, as Celestine believes, her personal guardian.

Celestine has never needed a guardian more. Her desire for revenge against the people who consigned her magician father to the flames is leading her down a dangerous path. And chaos is growing. Seven daemons from another realm are now threatening to lay siege to the mortal world. Now both Rieuk and Celestine must discover what it means to truly be a hero
